body:
Comment 8 by **james.harr**: 
After na√Øvely attempting to add aesN-cbc modes, it appears that transport.go is
engineered entirely around stream ciphers. A wrapper abstracting block/stream ciphers
into a single interface might be in order. This might also be a good time to get rid of
the fixed packetSizeMultiple (transport.go).

Contact me if you have time to lend me some SSH/go.crypto.ssh expertise and I'll see
what I can come up with for a patch.
